original_title: COPF to discuss on Sri Lankas DDO
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Committee on Public Finance will meet today to take a decision regarding the local debt optimization proposal.
It's Chairman Dr. Harsha de Silva said yesterday that the committee that met yesterday asked for the opinions of many parties in this regard.
The effect of the Local Debt Optimization Plan on the Employees' Provident Fund will be widely discussed today.
Meanwhile, the local debt optimization plan will be debated in Parliament tomorrow.
Samagi Jana Balawegaya MP Nalin Bandara said yesterday his party will vote against the local debt optimization plan proposal.
CCPI based headline inflation records another sharp decline in June 2023
Two world leaders found guilty of misusing social media and mass media for elections
Installation of boat service between India and Sri Lanka to be delayed
